articles.author: Sarah Fortinsky
articles.title: Musk says he’s disappointed in ‘big, beautiful bill,’ saying it ‘undermines’ DOGE’s work - The Hill
articles.description: Tech billionaire Elon Musk — who spearheaded the cost-cutting efforts at the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) — said he was “disappointed” to see the massive legislative package of Republican priorities make it through the House. “I was, like, disap…
